description: The function is vulnerable to Information Exposure through error messages (CWE-200) as it logs error messages that could potentially reveal sensitive information. It is also vulnerable to Uncontrolled Resource Consumption (CWE-400) as it does not limit the number of boot attempts, which could lead to resource exhaustion. Additionally, it is vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery (CWE-918) as it does not validate or restrict the 'req' parameter of the 'handleRequest' function, potentially allowing an attacker to make arbitrary HTTP requests to internal resources.
